[![PyPI version](https://badge.fury.io/py/pyosinfo.svg)](https://badge.fury.io/py/pyosinfo)


# pyosinfo


## Installation
For most users, the recommended method to install is via pip:
```cmd
pip install pyosinfo
```

or from source:

```cmd
python setup.py install
```

## Import
```python
import pyosinfo
```
